comment: First set up was easy and worked great. App disconnected that evening and wouldn't reconnect. I deleted the app from my Asus Zenwatch 2 and reinstalled and paired again. Seems to be ok now fingers crossed. Has helped me hugely as my work phone is an iphone and personal android.

author: Дмитрий Корнев
comment: Doesn't work with Android Wear 2 :( Frequently asks for the pairing on both devices :Android and iOS).

author: Nome Cognome
comment: I installed this app but any card didnt appear in my moto360 gen.2 and i cant start. Other apps are working successfully
title: Cant install

author: Piotr Dubicki
comment: Perfect app! S7 Edge and iPhone 7+ just connected together to my Huawei Watch.

Works great!  Android and IOS both connected to my Asus ZenWatch 2! Install on Android, install on IOS but leave running in background for IOS. Turn on app in watch. All notifications from both phones. Thanks

author: Birky Penner
comment: App sucks!!  Cant find anything that will work with iOS

author: Krishna R
comment: Worst app

author: Michael Stewart
comment: For 6 months worked great but it fails to work after upgrading to Android Wear 1.5. same thing happened with 1.4 but was fixed quickly with an update. Unfortunately its now useless

author: 杨辉
comment: At the beginning everything works fine. One day the watch disconnect from iPhone, and Android disconnect too. Now I have to open Bluetooth on the watch manually. And aerlink doesn't work anymore. 😥
title: Disappoint

author: Mim
comment: Great app. I can use my android wear both on android and ios at the same time. I bought the Aerlink on the ios even if it has little use, just to support the developer. You just need to find another BLE app on your iphone to make this one work even better.
title: Good job!

author: Michael Lakatamitis
comment: Working fine!!! Just pair your watch with the android. Then download the official app at your iphone and then enable on your watch the ios service and open Bluetooth when your are in the app and leave the app to work background!! Simple!!!! :)
title: Perfect

author: Cawanz cawan iz
comment: Hopefully with more functions added!! Example reply with keyboard in tweeter, imesssage, whatapp.
title: Great

author: Jack Tipper
comment: Where do I see this app on my iPhone 6?

author: hamid reza rastegar
comment: Always disconnected

author: Your Destination Day Spa, Inc
comment: App has helped me to connect my IPhone 6 and my Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge + using my Moto 360 2nd generation. Has not lost connection in the 3 days I have had it. But...... I would like to play next or previous track on IPhone since I listen to music from it. Samsung is for personal calls. If I could change the song without digging in my pocket would rate the app with 5 stars!!!
title: Great app!

author: Rusty Sproat
comment: Stops working after a couple of hours and nothing I do will fix it.  Message on watch shows  "Disconnected - Open Aerlink on IOS Device"  If I download Aerlink for IOS the message goes away but still doesn't show notifications.  The device is connected via Bluetooth, shows in Virtual Peripherals, shows connected inside Aerlink app on watch but will not show any notifications :-(  Soo frustrating

author: Vic Hogan
comment: This app is better than the iOS android wear app, which seems a little generic to me. The connection is very stable, and even works when the watch is on the charger. I have used for the 1st and 2nd gen 360. Not sure about the comment regarding changing the track, when you can do that by swiping left to bring up next/prev track and volume controls when playing music.
title: Better than the Android Wear app for ios

author: Tony Baez-Heredia
comment: This app is sweet when it works. The app sometimes disconnects and is next to impossible to pair back up.
title: Awesome When It Works

author: Alex Barton
comment: Can't connect after latest update
title: Latest beta breaks iPhone 6 to Moro 360

author: Alvaro Villavicencio
comment: Will no install in watch. No errors, notifications, nothing
title: Doesn't work with Sony smartwatch 3 at all

author: Chris Read
comment: This app won't download to the watch.
title: Lg G R issue

author: Jefri Dinomo
comment: I can't connect to my Motorola moto 360 from iPhone 6 after update. Please fix it asap...!!!
title: Can't connect

author: Dixy Agarwal
comment: What does this mean by open on ur watch... Plss help :(

author: Don Henry
comment: Thanks to this app I can connect to my android and iPhone simultaneously. 👌
title: 👍

author: Phy RF
comment: Can't connect

author: Arya Mirsepasi
comment: It connects great and it is very useful.
title: Perfect

author: Bryan Henson
comment: The first time I used this app with my iPhone 6 plus, it sync'd pretty easy and work for a few days. After the last  update, I have had ZERO pairing issues. My iPhone is still on iOS 8.3 and works perfectly. Thank you for fixing the issues it had. I recommend this for all Apple iPhone users who want the Android watch.

author: Matthew Pulsipher
comment: Works fantastically well, and it even plays nicely while connected to both my Android and my iPhone, allowing me to combine my personal and work notifications on my watch, something Android Wear can't even do natively with two Android devices. Note that the iOS side costs $2. It's worth it, given that it's rather bug-free and handles things like phone calls, music controls, and other things.

author: XIANG HUANG
comment: The new version is way better. I don't know but it keep the connection very well between my iPhone 5s and Moto360, drops are very rare. I only wish my Momto360 could display the stock (company) email message from my iPhone. Thank you an keep up the good work!

author: Murat Gul
comment: Great application, helped me use my Moto 360 with my IPhone 6. All notifications seen on Iphone 6 Notification Center such as WhatsApp, let five emails, messages are seen on moto 360 screen.  Please continue developing. Waiting for reply functions as well.

author: Alex Cordova
comment: WTF since the moto 360 update doesnt work anymore dont know what happened please fix this.
title: Used to work

author: Solomon Wu
comment: But it kill the battery. The battery  only last for 3 hrs without  doing anything for my galaxy gear live.
title: It work.

author: John Bauer
comment: Since there update I have to pay $2 for it to work on ios now and that is something I'm not willing to do for what it did before and since I haven't seen the update because I haven't payed for it I don't know how good the update works.....
title: Worked fine but

author: Bill Haofei Gong
comment: The new version works with iOS companion only (no longer free but I bought it anyway) and disconnect all the time. Developer really need to find a way to keep companion app alive at all time to resolve this issue.
title: Well…

author: Gleb Sokolov
comment: This app is the thing I waited for a long time! Thank you so much for creating it!
title: Work perfect!

author: Steve Kenward
comment: So followed the instructions, bought the IOS app, connected first time, now fails everything. Now even my android phone has stopped connecting!
title: WTF

author: M KM
comment: Works OK. Frequent disconnections.  Needs further refinement.
title: Great start. Still needs refinement!

author: Joey Smith
comment: Works GREAT! One issue though. Weather does not update in Watch Faces that include current temperature.

author: C Taylor
comment: No problems using Asus Zenwatch and iPhone 6 plus
title: Works great

author: Lou Bang504
comment: Everything works great except not being able to get txts
title: Great app
